articles.title: SBP remains committed to hosting Asia Cup Qualifiers in June - Manila Bulletin
articles.description: The Samahang Basketbol ng Pilipinas is fully committed to host the third and final window of the FIBA Asia Cup Qualifiers in mid-June despite the possibility of another postponement due to the current COVID-19 situation in the country.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Myanmar junta chief to attend ASEAN summit on first foreign trip since coup - ABC News
articles.description: The chief of Myanmar's military junta is set to attend the Association of South-East Asian Nations summit in Indonesia next week, for his first known foreign trip since he led the coup on February 1.

articles.title: Dye-based device sees the invisible, Business News - AsiaOne
